name: c26aa771-27c9-4000-95ad-b7342ab72d44
goal: To connect users with peer or professional group-support events that encourage social belonging and shared healing.

steps.text: Randomly suggest one or two example therapy or peer-support sessions, e.g.,
"Community Stress Management Meetup – Milan, Oct 26, 6 PM"
"Online Therapy Talk: Coping with Anxiety – Oct 27, 8 PM"
End with empathy or route to ${PLAYBOOK:Closure Playbook}.
